summary: Completed backend API testing for CallVault production hardening. All critical health check, diagnostic, and WebRTC endpoints are functional.

configuration_issues.issue: DATABASE_URL not configured - database features unavailable
configuration_issues.recommendation: Set DATABASE_URL environment variable for PostgreSQL connection

configuration_issues.impact: Using free public TURN servers not suitable for production
configuration_issues.recommendation: Configure custom TURN server with TURN_MODE=custom for production

configuration_issues.impact: Push notifications for offline users unavailable
configuration_issues.recommendation: Generate and set VAPID_PUBLIC_KEY and VAPID_PRIVATE_KEY

passed_tests: Root health check endpoint (/) - returns 'CallVault backend is running'
API health endpoint (/api/health) - returns JSON with timestamp
Version endpoint (/api/version) - returns app info and build details
Diagnostics endpoint (/api/diagnostics) - returns comprehensive system status
ICE verification endpoint (/api/ice-verify) - returns WebRTC configuration status
TURN config endpoint (/api/turn-config) - returns ICE servers array (6 servers)
Server time endpoint (/api/server-time) - returns synchronized server time

action_item_for_main_agent.database_setup: Configure DATABASE_URL environment variable to enable database features
action_item_for_main_agent.turn_server: Set up custom TURN server and configure TURN_MODE=custom for production reliability
action_item_for_main_agent.push_notifications: Generate VAPID keys for push notification support
action_item_for_main_agent.websocket_verification: WebSocket endpoint returns 200 instead of expected upgrade error - verify WebSocket functionality
